text: Woodleigh MRT Station (NE11) is an MRT Station in Singapore. It is along the North East MRT Line. The station is built on part of the former Bidadari Cemetery. The station was built in 2003. It remained closed for 8 years, with the train passing through without stopping, until it opened in 2011 to facilitate for recent developments around the area ==Timeline== *20 June 2003: Station built *20 June 2011: Station opened along with Damai (PE7) ==Former Codes== Formerly the code was: P5 (before opening) Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Woodleigh MRT station
